author: Sarah Burns
title: Coronavirus: Essential workers should carry indentification, Garda Commissioner says
description: Drew Harris: ‘We will stop individuals and be making sure their journey is essential’
content:
Over 2,500 gardaí are currently on duty across the country to ensure that people are observing the latest restriction measures to limit the spread of Covid-19, Garda Commissioner Drew Harris has said.
Mr Harris said gardaí will be stopping people to make sur… [+1838 chars]
